title: Windows 10 pro update of july 7/21 causes sound to stop
content: Hi, Until the above update firefox was ok for sound. Now it will cut out after 10 to 60 seconds. the video continues with out problem. I have re-installed the latest version twice and down restarts and cold boots. Chrome is not exhibiting this behavior when I go the the same sites, ie; MSNBC and CNN. Everytime that micros**t has an update it buggers up my sound. This is the first time I have not been able to fix it. Way to go micros**t. So how to fix or is a code modification needed? Allan
creator: allewell

title: Reason: CORS request not http, can't bypass with file_unique_origin  - Firefox 89
content:
I am trying to do some local web development, if I open an index file directly in Firefox it complains that the CORS request is not being made over HTTP. I know I can try and set up a local web server for development but that's beside the point.

According to this previous Mozilla post linked below I can set privacy.file_unique_origin to false, and it's suppose to override the security setting. This does not work for me, setting it to false and closing all browsers and testing the HTML file again, I still see the CORS error. Is this setting now useless in the newest version of Firefox? Is there a different config setting I need to adjust?

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1264280
creator: vallamost

title: Installed MetaMask plugin
content: Hello I recently installed firefox on my mac, however mistakenly through a DMG file. I have also installed metamask, a plugin. However the data wasnt stored. Is there a way to retrieve the data as I have also lost my seed phrase (crypto wallet).
creator: kaiamirin

title: UI controls in Settings are blank
content:
When I go into Settings, the buttons/controls/fields are white/blank and unreadable. See attached screenshot; note the 4 white rectangles in the Language and Appearance section at the bottom, and the 3 white rectangles on the right side of the General section.

If I click on these they still function.

I've tried Troubleshooting Mode and the problem still occurs.

Changing Theme doesn't fix the problem.
creator: bshanks

title: Firefox 89.0.2 has become unusable
content: Firefox 89.0.2 has become unusable; type is faint, boxes etc. do not show. Want to know how to make screan clearer, show details. I have tried settings, new themes. Nothing seems to help. Some sites are OK but most to faint to read. Unusable.
creator: johnpick

title: Audio stops after buffering
content:
Once a video stops to buffer then resumes, the firefox window that has the video stops outputting audio. Opening new firefox windows / other currently open firefox windows will play audio, but the current window, even if a new tab is opened, will not play audio. Other programs (e.g. spotify) and browsers (chrome) do not seem to have this issue.

In the windows 10 audio mixer it can be seen that firefox isn't outputting any sound, if that wasn't clear from the fact that other programs and windows are able to play audio.
creator: hanminkim123

title: Get message and forward
content: where is is the get messages button and the forward button??? very annoying
creator: eric25

title: How to customize dark theme?
content:
Hi, I use the dark theme (kudos to the author). I have poor vision and low contrast stuff is hard to read.

When I am on a particular tab (window/pane), the tab itself is a very dark grey and is hard to distinguish from the other tabs.

Is there any way to customize the theme so that the selected tab is a lighter shade of gray?

Thank you.
creator: rtayek
